trans-unit.source: Represents a set of proposed changes to a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 表示一组对运行中工作流实例的建议的更改。

trans-unit.source: All proposed changes to a running workflow instance must be made using a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges> object.
trans-unit.target: 所有对运行中工作流实例的建议的更改必须使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges> 对象进行。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges> object is constructed in application code (outside the workflow instance), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> object that is passed to the constructor must be the object that is returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowDefinition%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序代码（工作流实例之外）中构造 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges> 对象时，传递到构造函数的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> 对象必须是由 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowDefinition%2A> 类的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> 方法返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges> 对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自“订单状态机”SDK 示例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ordering State Machine Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[排序状态机示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c)。

trans-unit.source: The root <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 工作流的根 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rootActivity" /> is a null reference (Visual Basic <see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rootActivity" /> 为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rootActivity" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rootActivity" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rootActivity" /> is in design mode.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rootActivity" /> 处于设计模式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the condition that must be satisfied to apply the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定必须满足才能应用 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges" /> 的条件。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set on a root activity to disallow dynamic updates to the running workflow.
trans-unit.target: 可以在根活动上设置此属性，以便禁止动态更新运行中的工作流。

trans-unit.source: When the property is set on the root activity, and condition evaluates to `false`, the dynamic updates are disallowed on the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 在根活动上设置该属性时，如果条件的计算结果为 `false`，则在工作流实例上禁止动态更新。

trans-unit.source: If the condition evaluates to `true`, or the condition is not set, the dynamic updates are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果条件的计算结果为 `true`，或者未设置条件，则允许动态更新。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> (or derived type) that contains a condition property, such as the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> and <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> activities.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含条件属性的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />（或派生类型），例如 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> 活动。

trans-unit.source: Gets the condition property on a dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 获取依赖对象的条件属性。

trans-unit.source: A condition property type, such as <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个条件属性类型，例如 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty> is an attached dependency property, that is, it is declared and used by one type and set on another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty> 是附加的依赖属性，即由一种类型声明和使用，而在另一种类型上设置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, there must be static `get` and `set` methods on the type declaring the property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在声明属性的类型上必须有静态的 `get` 和 `set` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Helper method for getting <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty> 的帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyObject" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyObject" /> 为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dependencyObject" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> or a type that derives from <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencyObject" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> 或从 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> 派生的类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> (or derived type) that contains a condition property, such as the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> and <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> activities.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含条件属性的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />（或派生类型），例如 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> 活动。

trans-unit.source: The condition type to set on the dependency object, such as an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 在依赖对象上设置的条件类型，例如 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the condition property on a dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 在依赖对象上设置条件属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty> is an attached dependency property, that is, it is declared and used by one type and set on another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty> 是附加的依赖属性，即由一种类型声明和使用，而在另一种类型上设置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, there must be static `get` and `set` methods on the type declaring the property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在声明属性的类型上必须有静态的 `get` 和 `set` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Helper method for setting <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty> 的帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a cloned activity tree to which changes can be made and then applied to the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回克隆的活动树，可以对该树进行更改，然后将更改应用到运行中的工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> that contains the cloned root activity for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />，其中包含工作流的克隆的根活动。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates adding activities to the TransientWorkflow property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将活动添加到 TransientWorkflow 属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自“订单状态机”SDK 示例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ordering State Machine Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[排序状态机示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c)。

trans-unit.source: Validates the current set of proposed changes that have been made to the activity tree represented by the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.TransientWorkflow" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 验证当前的建议更改集，这些更改是对 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.TransientWorkflow" /> 属性表示的活动树所进行的更改。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> object that contains any errors or warnings that occurred during validation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> 对象，其中包含在验证期间发生的任何错误或警告。
